TopicTitle: Any good futuristic (star trek/star wars ish) mods

Articles.Content: I'm looking for a good mod to make futuristic spaceships .

There are many mods, like :

- ksp interstellar extended   

- kerbal foundries (for anti gravity)

- alcubierre warp drive

- Near future solar

- Near future electrical

- Near future propulsion (and many other near future packs)

- ksp interstellar endurance

- B9

Star war-ish mods :

- deathstars (kopernicus plugin)

- KIE

- future weapons

- BD armoury  (and various mods based on it )

- Star wars mod

- kerbolbattles

And there are many others. I don't remember but will surely tell sometimes later ...
Check out mine. Its in the sig
Some of them don't work in 1.1.3.
